channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: America once had enough silver to meet its needs. But that’s been outsourced too.
item.description: Charlie Garcia responds to readers’ concerns about China’s control of silver and other critical metals used in technology and defense.

item.title: This could be a better — and safer — way into the AI trade in 2026
item.description: Investors might be well served to look beyond semiconductor makers to take part in the AI boom — and more toward the companies that make manufacturing...

item.title: ‘So much for holiday cheer’: I saw a guest take a bottle of wine as they left a Christmas party. Do I tell the host?
item.description: “I guess he thought no one would notice. It came in a gift bag, and it looked expensive.”

item.title: Investors pin hopes on the ‘January barometer,’ with stocks set to skip ‘Santa Claus rally’ for a 3rd year
item.description: For the third straight year, the S&P 500 looks poised to fall during the “Santa Claus rally” period. That has never happened before.

item.title: This one unavoidable tax can sink your retirement plan
item.description: How to trim your tax bill when taking RMDs.

item.title: These are the most overbought and oversold stocks in the S&P 500 as 2026 begins
item.description: The year just began, but there may be opportunities for investors to catch potential bounces on some stocks — or avoid pullbacks near-term.

item.title: Buffett backs new CEO Greg Abel with 'huge endorsement' in CNBC interview
item.description: Warren Buffett told CNBC he'd rather have new Berkshire CEO Greg Abel handle his money "than any of the top investment advisers or any of the top CEOs...

item.title: Bank of America expects a boost in dividends in 2026. These stocks have payouts that beat the market
item.description: Bank of America's Savita Subramanian expects stocks’ dividend growth will rise year over year in 2026.

item.title: Berkshire Hathaway shares dip as Warren Buffett exits and Greg Abel era begins
item.description: Investors digested the formal end of Warren Buffett's six-decade tenure as chief executive and the start of a new era under successor Greg Abel.

item.title: Bank of America is betting on these stocks, including one Big Tech laggard, in the first quarter of 2026
item.description: BofA named Amazon, Boeing and Dollar General to its list of 10 stocks that could notch strong gains in the first quarter of 2026.

item.title: Holy Ship! HII Stock Jumps on Trump Navy Ship Plans
item.description: HII stock rises on Trump's Golden Fleet plans for new powerful warships. Explore how navy announcements impact markets, with balanced views on potenti...

item.title: Intuitive Machines Stock Rockets on Analyst Upgrade
item.description: Meta description: Intuitive Machines (LUNR) stock rockets 37% on KeyBanc overweight rating and $20 target amid lunar contract potential. Discover risk...

item.title: Sable Offshore Stock Surges on Trump Admin Pipeline Boost
item.description: Whoa, folks, have you seen what’s happening with Sable Offshore today? This energy player, ticker SOC, is lighting up the charts with one of the bigge...

item.title: DBVT Stock Rockets on Positive Peanut Allergy Patch Trial
item.description: DBVT stock surges as much as 46% on positive Phase 3 results for Viaskin Peanut patch, a potential breakthrough treatment for peanut allergies in youn...

item.title: Trump’s Weed Pivot Ignites CGC Stock Surge
item.description: Canopy Growth (CGC) surges 50%+ as Trump eyes marijuana reclassification. Explore the buzz, risks, and trading lessons in this volatile sector.
